resources.string:
Help
 This app allows you to view masjid jamaat times, as well as add/change the times. If anyone makes any changes, then everyone sees the new version. It's a bit like editing wikipedia in that way, although atm there is no history being stored.

 Editing times
 When adding/changing masjid times, please bear in mind that pressing any button (up/down/left/right/copy up/copy down) will save the time you have entered to the server. This will slightly change in the future to allow undoing the save for a brief period after saving, but otherwise, the interface probably won't change. The interface is designed for speed of data entry, as this app lives and dies on how easy it is to enter and view the data.
 Also bear in mind that this app is a work in progressâ€¦
